and (permission_name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or permission_url like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') )

select count(1) from sys_permission p where p.permission_url=#{url} and (exists (select 1 from sys_user_role ur join sys_role_permission rp on ur.role_id=rp.role_id where ur.user_id=#{userId} and rp.permission_id=p.id_) or exists (select 1 from sys_user_permission up where up.user_id=#{userId} and up.permission_id=p.id_))
